info.brief_description: Fanfictions for all the movies in the Honey I Shrunk the Kid franchise
info.description:
Interactive fanfictions based on the films from Disney's "Honey I Shrunk the Kids" franchise. Those movies are:

-Honey I Shrunk the Kids
-Honey I Blew Up the Kid
-Honey We Shrunk Ourselves
-Honey I Shrunk the Audience

You can change the plot of the movies any way you like. Or create an entirely new storyline with any of the characters. The rating is GC so nothing has be family appropriate (*hint hint*) Just about anything goes, I will delete little, but I will still get rid of what I don't like. Other than that, have fun!
